mapper.insert: insert into game (game_name, game_price, game_description, game_discount, game_promotion, game_character, game_img, game_down,game_sale,game_time) values (#{gameName},#{gamePrice}, #{gameDescription},#{gameDiscount},#{gamePromotion},#{gameCharacter},#{gameImg},#{gameDown}, #{gameSale},#{gameTime})
mapper.select: select * from game where game_name like '%${gameName}%'
select game_id,game_img,game_name , game_sale from game order by game_sale desc , game_name asc limit 0,10
select game_id,game_img,game_name,game_discount,game_price from game where game_promotion = '1' order by game_discount asc, game_time asc limit 0,5
select game_id,game_img,game_name,game_character,game_discount,game_price from game where game_promotion = '1' order by game_time desc , game_discount asc limit 0,10
select game_id,game_img,game_name,game_character,game_discount,game_price,game_promotion from game order by game_time desc , game_name asc limit 0,10
select game_name from game where game_name = #{gameName}
mapper.update: update cart set cart_name = #{gameName},cart_img = #{gameImg},cart_price = #{price} where cart_gameid = #{gameId}
update collection set collection_name = #{gameName},collection_price = #{price}, collection_img = #{gameImg} where collection_gameid = #{gameId}
update sort set sort_count = sort_count + 1 where sort_id in (select a.sort_id from (select sort_id from sort where sort_name = #{gameCharacter}) as a)
update sort set sort_count = sort_count - 1 where sort_name = #{gameCharacter}
update game set game_sale = game_sale + 1 where game_id = #{gameId}
update sort set sort_count = sort_count - 1 where sort_name = #{dec}
update sort set sort_count = sort_count + 1 where sort_name = #{gameCharacter}
